sentence: I had to buy a wireless mouse to go with it, as I am old school and really hate the pad, but knew that before I bought it, now it works great, need to get adjusted to the key board, as I am used to a bigger one and pounding.

I had to buy a wireless mouse to go with it, as I am old school and hate the pad, but knew that before I bought it, now it works greatly great, need to get adjusted to the key board, as I am used to a bigger one and pounding.

The only thing I dislike is the touchpad, alot of the times its unresponsive and does things I do nt want it too, I would decidedly recommend using a mouse with it.
The only thing I deeply dislike is the touchpad, alot of the times its extremely unresponsive and does things I do nt want it too, I would recommend using a mouse with it.

sentence: Works badly, and I am extremely happy to be back to an apple OS.
